rows.label: qst201325_msg0002
rows.name:
Those people said they were going to use us
in experiments... and that they'd keep doing
it over and over until they succeeded.

rows.label: qst201325_msg0003
rows.name:
If help hadn't come,
we would have been...

rows.label: qst201325_msg0004
rows.name:
Thank you so much for
coming to save us!

rows.label: qst201325_msg0005
rows.name:
Have we rescued all of the
kidnapped children now?

rows.label: qst201325_msg0006
rows.name: Let's hurry and meet up with Tokiha!

rows.label: qst201325_msg0007
rows.name: Is that all of the abducted kids?

rows.label: qst201325_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm worried about Tokiha. Let's
hurry and meet up with her!

rows.label: qst201325_msg0009
rows.name:
All kidnapped littlepon
rescued now, mo.

rows.label: qst201325_msg0010
rows.name: Let's go meet up with Tokiha, mo!

rows.label: qst201325_msg0011
rows.name:
I believe we have rescued all
of the kidnapped children now.

rows.label: qst201325_msg0012
rows.name: Now, let us rendezvous with Tokiha.

rows.label: qst201325_msg0013
rows.name:
Reckon that's all the
kidnapped kids, eh?

rows.label: qst201325_msg0014
rows.name:
I'm worried. Let's hurry
and meet up with Tokiha.
